title: Man killed in Tuesday quadruple shooting identified
content:
A 19-year-old man who was killed Tuesday (Aug. 25) in a quadruple shooting near Fern and Olive Streets has been identified as Kentrell Jones by the Orleans Parish Coroner's Office.
New Orleans police said Jones and three adult men were shot while standing on the corner around 7 p.m.
Jones was pronounced dead at the scene. The three other victims arrived at the hospital via private conveyance.
Police said they were looking for a dark-colored Ford F-150 truck that was seen leaving the shooting scene.
Jones was among two killed and six injured in a violent four-hour span in New Orleans Tuesday.
